title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
Introducing the Hydroponics Growing System, a simple and efficient indoor garden designed specifically for elderly folks. This complete system includes 12 pods and an LED Grow Light, ensuring your plants receive the perfect amount of light for optimal growth.

The LED Grow Light features SMD LED technology, providing 25W of power and a full-spectrum light that is 30% more luminous than traditional lights. This means your plants will receive the ideal light conditions to thrive, and it can even speed up their growth by 5 times!

With our advanced Deep Flow water circulation system, your plants will receive fresh and clean water every 30 minutes. The low noise level of the water pump ensures a peaceful environment for you to enjoy your garden.

The Hydroponics Growing System also includes a 4L water tank, providing self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days. The larger space for roots and water level gauge make it easy to monitor and maintain your plants' hydration needs.

Adjusting the height of your plants is a breeze with the adjustable rod, which can extend up to 17.78 inches. This allows you to accommodate plants of various sizes and types.

In addition to the Hydroponics Growing System, you will also receive a complete package of essential items, including the hydroponics system itself, plant food, planting hats and baskets, biochar mud, an adapter, and a helpful manual to guide you through the setup process.

We stand behind the quality and performance of our product, which is why we offer a generous 360-day warranty period. And if you ever need assistance, our after-sales service team is available to support you.

Experience the joy of gardening without the hassle with the Hydroponics Growing System. Start growing your own fresh and healthy plants today!

Introducing the Hydroponics Growing System, a simple and efficient way to grow your own plants indoors! This system comes with 12 pods and a powerful LED Grow Light to ensure optimal growth for your plants.

The LED Grow Light features SMD LED technology, with a power of 25W and a full-spectrum feature. It provides 30% more luminous flux than traditional lights, which means your plants will receive more light energy to speed up their growth by 5 times!

The water circulation system uses an advanced deep flow technique, cycling water every 30 minutes. Not only does it keep the water fresh and clean, but it also operates at a low noise level, ensuring a peaceful environment.

With a 4L water tank capacity, this system offers self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days. The water tank also comes with a convenient water level gauge, so you can easily monitor the water level without any confusion.

The adjustable height feature allows you to extend the rods up to 17.78 inches, accommodating various plant types and their growth stages. You can adjust the height as needed to ensure your plants receive the perfect amount of light and grow to their fullest potential.

In the package, you will find everything you need to get started, including the hydroponics system, plant food, planting hats, planting baskets, biochar mud, an adapter, and a manual. We've got you covered!

Rest assured, your purchase is protected by a generous 360-day warranty period. Our after-sales service is also available to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.

Experience the joy of gardening with the Hydroponics Growing System. It's designed to be easily accessible for our elderly folks who may be easily confused. Start growing your own plants effortlessly and enjoy the benefits of fresh, homegrown produce all year round!

With a water tank capacity of 4L, our Hydroponics Growing System offers self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days. You won't have to worry about constantly refilling the tank. Plus, it comes with a water level gauge, allowing you to easily monitor the water level without any hassle.

The adjustable height feature of our Hydroponics Growing System allows you to extend the rod height up to 17.78 inches, accommodating various plant types and sizes. Whether you're growing herbs, flowers, or vegetables, our system has got you covered.

When you purchase our Hydroponics Growing System, you'll receive everything you need to get started. The package includes the hydroponics system itself, plant food, planting hats, planting baskets, biochar mud, an adapter, and a manual. We've got you covered from start to finish.

To give you peace of mind, our Hydroponics Growing System comes with a warranty period of 360 days. If you ever need assistance or have any concerns, our after-sales service is available to support you.

Introducing the Hydroponics Growing System, a simple and convenient way to grow plants indoors without the need for soil. Perfect for elderly folks who may find traditional gardening methods challenging, this hydroponics system offers a range of features designed to make gardening accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

The system is equipped with an advanced SMD LED Grow Light, which provides full-spectrum lighting and is 30% more luminous than traditional lights. With a 4L water tank, this system is designed to be self-sufficient for up to 18 days. The tank has a water level gauge, so you can easily monitor the water level and ensure that your plants are getting the right amount of water.
